channel.title: Need help badly! makin spells use runes!
channel.description: help mee!!! i realy want to knwo how to amke my server use runes for spells becouse ive juts made runecrafting but now i want to make spells need runes somebodhy please help me !!! thx chirs

item.title: Need help badly! makin spells use runes!

item.description:

sorry that won’t work if the boolean saying whether or not you have it says you always have it.
